text: Adrián del Caro is an American historian of German and Austrian literature, currently a Distinguished Humanities Professor at University of Tennessee. He has written several monographs on Freidrich Nietzsche and translated several books by Nietzsche into English. ==References== Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people Category:University of Tennessee faculty Category:21st-century American historians Category:University of Minnesota alumni Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:Nietzsche scholars Category:Translators of Friedrich Nietzsche
title: Adrian Del Caro
